# WelcomeStructure
public class Welcome {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//Scanner obj=new Scanner(System.in);
		String a="WELCOME";
		for(int i=0;i<a.length();i++)
		{
			for(int j=0;j<=i;j++)
			{
			char b=a.charAt(j);
			System.out.print(b);
			System.out.print(" ");
			}
			System.out.println(" ");
		}
		}	
	}
